title: Time to remember: 1915 - your country needs you
brief_description: An outline of World War I events during 1915, showing the trench warfare from the North Sea to the Alps, the Dardanelles and Gallipoli, the building of the new British volunteer army by Lord Kitchener and its baptism of fire at Loos. Narrated by Stanley Holloway. Suitable for upper secondary level.
